about_the_game:
Planet Theta is dating & social engagement re-imagined. Create real connections in a virtual world, and take your date for walks through an enchanted forest, watch a movie together, or just have a chill cup of coffee. The choice is yours so come step into the Theta-Verse and find your life partner.




IMMERSIVE DATING LOCATIONS
  • Cafe Torchia is the perfect date and includes a special micro dating area for those still searching for their partner.
  • Take your favorite match or friends on a walk through our Enchanted Forest, filled with unique scenery. Take a moment to watch the deer graze, or sit down and dip your toes in the water.
  • Take your date to our Movie Theater that will be rolling licensed movies at all times.
  • And many more!




LOCATION AND AVATAR CUSTOMIZATION
  • Everyone will have their own private corner - when you need a break from all of the stress and noise of the real world, head on over to YourPlace - a fully customizable living area! Bring friends over to chat, play a game, or snuggle up for a good movie. It's up to you. You are in control!
  • Will your Avatar be a true likeness to yourself, or will you try something a little more “out there”? Whatever your style is, bring it to life with us. Customization includes Clothes, Hair, Accessories, Makeup, and more. We allow the player to customize their own character through in-game options such as Gender, and other personal details.
  • As well as designing your own, we’re introducing life-like Avatars through our partnership with Wolf3D! Choose from a single photo to build a realistic virtual version of you, matching your facial features, hair, clothing, and more! This cutting-edge technology will add to the unique experience of virtual dating!



FEATURES AND EXTRAS
  • Sit back and relax in our realistic movie theater - we’ve licensed several movies so that you can chill in a virtual matinee.
  • Set the scene for your date via our living music store - purchase licensed music that will then play in your apartment.
  • A fully immersive, social experience.
  • Simple and intuitive matchmaking.
  • Explore multiple dating experiences within a safe environment.
  • Find love with new and exciting people.
  • Fully customizable avatars created from uploaded pictures.
  • Express individuality with hand gestures, emotes, and emojis.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our app has NO depictions of sexual acts, nudity, or violence.

We have a dating feature and want the app to be adults-only to ensure a good dating experience for our users.

In addition, some of our meeting areas are virtual bars and dance clubs. At these locations, users are able to virtually drink an alcoholic drink (beer, wine, cocktails) or smoke items (cigarette, hookah, cigar) that are adult in nature.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX3450 or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound
  • VR Support: Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Quest 2 (link), Oculus Rift
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound
  • VR Support: Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Quest 2 (link), Oculus Rift
